INTRODUCTION.TITLE: Before You Proceed...
INTRODUCTION.SUB_TITLE: we went you to know what your getting involved in.
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL: Here's everything you need to know
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_1: Will writing can be easy and straightforward. You don’t need a lawyer!
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_2: Having a will ensures that your estate is distributed according to your wishes and avoids any potential disputes.
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_3: MoneyOwl’s step-by-step will writing process is simple, easy and safe. With unlimited edits, you can edit your will whenever you need.
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_4: To write a will, you should be…
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_5: Unfortunately we are unable to assist muslims in writing their will as the advice of a Syariah-trained lawyer is required.
INTRODUCTION.WHY_WILL_CONTENT_6: Are you ready to write your will?
INTRODUCTION.OFFER_PERIOD: FREE for a limited time only!

TELL_US_YOURSELF.TITLE: Tell Us About Yourself
TELL_US_YOURSELF.SUB_TITLE: In the next step, we will be gathering personal information about you that will be reflected in your will.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.SUB_TITLE: Please enter your details accurately, as per identification document (NRIC, FIN, Birth Cert or Passport)

MY_FAMILY.TITLE: About My Family
MY_FAMILY.SUB_TITLE: Please enter your details accurately, as per identification document (NRIC, FIN, Birth Cert or Passport)

MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.TITLE: My Children's Guardians
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.SUB_TITLE_WITHOUT_SPOUSE: Your children under 21 years old would need a guardian to care for and protect their interests.
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.SUB_TITLE_WITH_SPOUSE: Your spouse will be the natural guardian of your children under 21 years old.
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.BOTTOM_INFO: Your spouse will be the natural guardian of your child. However you may appoint an alternative guardian in the unfortunate event that your spouse no longer around.
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.ALTERNATIVE_SUB_TITLE: Takes over the role as your children’s guardian in the event that your spouse passes on before you.
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.GUARDIAN_SUB_TITLE: We recommend you to appoint a family member, friend or someone you trust.
MY_CHILDS_GUARDIAN.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE:
The role of a guardian is to raise your children after you have passed on, until they reach the age of 21.

Taking over your role as the “parent”, the guardian will have the ability to make decisions that affect your children, including their day-to-day care to their moral upbringing.

It is also important that you speak with your children’s guardian to seek their agreement.

DISTRIBUTE_YOUR_ESTATE.TITLE: Distribute Your Estate
DISTRIBUTE_YOUR_ESTATE.SUB_TITLE: In the next step, you will decide who inherits which portion of your estate.

APPOINT_YOUR_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.TITLE: Appoint Your Executors & Trustees
APPOINT_YOUR_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.SUB_TITLE: In the next step, you will appoint someone to manage and carry out the wishes of your will.

ELIGIBILITY.TITLE: Check Your Eligibility
ELIGIBILITY.SUB_TITLE: Let’s check if our will writing tool is suitable for you.
ELIGIBILITY.SUB_TITLE1: Let’s check if our will writing
ELIGIBILITY.INLINE_ERROR: Please consider seeking advice from a lawyer as you or your assets may be governed under the laws of a foreign jurisdiction.
ELIGIBILITY.YOUR_ASSETS_IN_SINGAPORE: Are all your assets in Singapore?
ELIGIBILITY.FIND_OUT_ASSETS_CAN_DISTRIBUTE: Find out what assets can be distributed via your will.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Assets To Be Distributed
TOOLTIP.MESSAGE:
Generally, only the following assets can be distributed via your will.

  • - Bank Accounts (Non-joint)
  • - Investments (Non-joint)
  • - Insurance (Without nomination or trusts)
  • - Property (Sole or tenancy-in-common)

To distribute your CPF, you should make a separate CPF nomination.

MUSLIM_ERROR.TITLE: Sorry, we are unable to assist you.
MUSLIM_ERROR.MESSAGE: As you are covered under Syariah laws, your will must adhere to faraid principles. We recommend that you approach a Syariah-law trained lawyer.

REVIEW_YOUR_DETAILS.TITLE: Review Your Details
REVIEW_YOUR_DETAILS.SUB_TITLE: In the next step, please check that all details provided are accurate.

MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.TITLE: My Executors & Trustees
MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.SUB_TITLE: As this person plays a critical role in executing your will, please choose someone you trust.
MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.BOTTOM_INFO: Generally, we advise you to appoint your spouse, a family member or trusted friend as executor & trustee.
MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.ALT_EXEC_TRUSTEE_SUB_TITLE: Takes over the role as your children’s guardian in the event that your spouse passes on before you.
MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE:
After you have passed on, your executor & trustee is in charge of carrying out the wishes of your will. As the 2 roles tend to overlap, it is common for someone to be appointed as both executor and trustee.

The role of an executor and trustee includes settling outstanding debts of your estate (using your assets) and distributing your estate according to your wishes.

As this person plays a critical role in executing your will, it is important that you speak with them to seek their agreement.
MY_EXECUTOR_TRUSTEE.MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: Generally, we advise you to appoint a family member or trusted friend as executor & trustee.

MY_BENEFICIARY.TITLE: My Beneficiaries
MY_BENEFICIARY.SUB_TITLE: Name the beneficiaries (max. 7) that you would like to inherit your estate.
MY_BENEFICIARY.BOTTOM_INFO: Your spouse will be the natural guardian of your child. However you may appoint an alternative guardian in the unfortunate event that your spouse no longer around.
MY_BENEFICIARY.MIN_BENEFICIARY: Please select at least 1 beneficiary to continue.

MY_ESTATE_DISTRIBUTION.TITLE: My Estate Distribution
MY_ESTATE_DISTRIBUTION.SUB_TITLE: Now that you have listed your beneficiaries, determine how much each person inherits.

ERROR_MODAL.ADJUST_PERCENTAGE: Oops! You need to distribute all 100% of your estate.
ERROR_MODAL.NON_ALLOCATED_PERCENTAGE: Oops! You have a beneficiary that was not allocated any percentage of your estate.

MY_ESTATE_DISTRIBUTION.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: If any of your beneficiaries pass on before you, their portion of the estate will be redistributed to your other beneficiaries proportionately.

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Confirmation
CONFIRMATION.SUB_TITLE: Please check that all details provided are accurate as they will be reflected in your will.

SIGN_UP.DESCRIPTION: To view your will, please login to your account.
